text: [Music]
nationwide is a hundred thirty year old
organization it's a member owned
organization it's the largest building
Society in the world we have got 15
million members we have a relationship
with about one in four of the UK
households we provide a safe place for
members to save we provide a safe place
for those who conducts their everyday
banking and we lend out those savings so
that members can buy their own homes the
challenge what we're trying to overcome
or that the thing that we're trying to
achieve is to work out how we take what
we've got today and make sure that it's
still successful in five 10 15 years
time and the core part of that is a
technology story and for us cloud is
absolutely key it's that ability to
create the reliability the scalability
the security and then also be able to
measures operational costs we have
chosen idea versus being our cloud
platform of choice for affecting our
digital transformation we have created a
core platform which is our nation wide
digital accelerator platform and on that
platform we have built out to customer
journeys one in mortgages and one in
banking running through AWS on the
mortgage side of things we run 100% of
our switcher traffic through there so if
you are a nationwide member with a
mortgage and you want to move to a
different products all of that workloads
going through AWS and then a relatively
small amounts but growing by remortgage
business so this is new members moving
their existing mortgage into nationwide
and then on the current account side we
start to do some of our current account
sales through AWS we've had some really
quite impressive wins so far so from a
switcher perspective the old system made
customers input about 300 bits of data
and the entire process took about 65
minutes end to end over an hour we've
taken that down to 30 bits of data and
the average time is 15 minutes through
the use of automation we can now build
environments in minutes rather than
weeks we can get teams on-boarded in
hours rather than months and then
quality so we can build automation in
right from the start and the point of
which coach Sox have been cuts or
environment starts be created
all the way through into production and
we can systemic ly build quality in such
that we deliver to the end member is
both faster and we can be more certain
that we've done all the cause checks
right the way through the process
working with AWS over last year has
allowed us to deliver things that I
never thought were possible both the
rate at which have been able to deliver
it and the outcome we've got for our
members has been beyond my expectations
and I'm really excited about what we're
gonna be able to achieve over the next
12 to 18 months
